mapper.insert: insert into commu_qna values(null,#{commu_num},#{ml_num},#{qna_content},(select ifnull(max(qna_ref)+1,1) from commu_qna q),#{qna_lev},now())
mapper.select: select q.qna_num,q.qna_ref,q.qna_lev,q.qna_content,q.qna_regdate, m.mb_name,p.pro_num from commu_qna q join member_info m on q.ml_num = m.ml_num join profile_img p on m.pro_num = p.pro_num where commu_num=#{commu_num} and qna_lev=0 order by qna_ref desc,qna_num asc limit #{startRow},4

select q.qna_num,q.qna_ref,q.qna_lev,q.qna_content,q.qna_regdate, m.mb_name,p.pro_num from commu_qna q join member_info m on q.ml_num = m.ml_num join profile_img p on m.pro_num = p.pro_num where commu_num=#{commu_num} and qna_lev=1 and qna_ref=#{qna_ref} order by qna_ref desc,qna_num asc
select NVL(count(*),0) from commu_qna where commu_num=#{commu_num} and qna_lev=0
